Woods.text: You trip over an object which turns out to be a rusty lockbox. If you open it, make a Luck(0) check and consult the following chart. Successes. 0) A rotted human foot. Lose 1 Sanity. 1) Draw 1 Common Item 2) Draw 1 Unique Item 3+)$10 in jewelery.

YeOldeMagickShoppe.text: Looking closely at a mummified head in the shop, you are horrified to find it looking back at you! Lose 1 Sanity

StMarysHospital.text: One of the staff physicians talks some sense into you. You are disabused of certain crazy but accurate notions. Lose 1 Clue token.
